introduction.subject: Introduction
introduction.p0: Guardians of Adelia is a MMORPG minecraft server. Gameplay focuses on beating dungeons while exploring a huge open world. Currently there are 12 playable classes with unique skill sets. And you can unlock all classes in one chracter. There are lots of other features like quests, pets, crafting etc. which you can explore in this guide!

p1.text1: You can learn how to jump into the server in
p1.text2: or continue to read more about

how-to-play.subject: How to play?
how-to-play.p0: Server resource pack is required to play or you will see a lot of visual errors. To join server with server resource pack follow these steps:
how-to-play.step2: Enable the server resource packs in the Edit Server Info menu
how-to-play.step3: Join the server and wait for the resource pack to load. If you are having problems in this step see below.

p1.step2: Go to your %appdata% folder and click on .minecraft. Then go to server-resource-packs and delete 'legacy' or anything Guardians of Adelia related.
